description: This PHP source file defines a web page interface for managing LAN Ethernet ports on a gateway device, including enabling/disabling a port (Port 4 for XFINITY HOME) and displaying status information for Ethernet interfaces.

methods.name: getPort4XHSEnabled
methods.description: Determines if Ethernet Port 4 is enabled for XFINITY HOME based on device configuration.

methods.name: NameMap
methods.description: Maps link status strings ('Up', 'Down') to user-friendly display terms ('Active', 'Inactive').
